Elemento 2.4.9
  1. org.jboss.elemento.intl
  2. DurationFormatOptions

Uses of Interface
org.jboss.elemento.intl.DurationFormatOptions

Packages that use DurationFormatOptions
Package
Description
org.jboss.elemento.intl
Provides type-safe Java mappings for the JavaScript Intl API, enabling locale-aware formatting of dates, times, numbers, lists, durations, and relative times.

  • Uses of DurationFormatOptions in org.jboss.elemento.intl

    DurationFormatOptions.minutes(Format minutes)
    If DurationFormatOptions.hours(Format) is Format.numeric or Format._2digit, possible values are Format.numeric and Format._2digit, and Format.numeric is normalized to Format._2digit; the default is Format.numeric.

    The numbering system to use for number formatting, such as "arab", "hans", "mathsans", and so on.
